title: A Bayesian Approach to Modeling Arm-Injury Risk in Pitchers (in development)
description: Developing a Bayesian model to forecast season-ahead arm-injury risk for MLB pitchers. Applied partial pooling in a hierarchical framework to improve predictions for pitchers with limited histories. Constructed a longitudinal dataset of 6,300 pitcher-seasons by integrating large-scale baseball and injury data sources.

title: Quantifying Defensive Aggression With a Bayesian Hierarchical Model
description: Formulated 'Aggression Over Expected' (AOE) by engineering a Bayesian hierarchical framework that contrasts individual player posteriors against positional counterfactuals, utilizing MCMC sampling and partial pooling to regularize estimates across limited sample sizes. Trained a Logistic Generalized Additive Model (GAM) to quantify catch probability from spatiotemporal tracking data, achieving 0.162 test log-loss and 95.7% test F1. Earned honorable mention recognition as a Top 10 finalist among 50 teams (114 students) in the 2025 SMT Data Challenge.

title: The Effect of Two Strikes on a Hitter's Swing
description: Constructed an interactive visual analytics dashboard using Python and D3.js, utilizing 700,000+ Statcast records to identify relationships between deviations in swing mechanics and contact quality in two-strike contexts.

title: What Is a Home Worth? Large-Scale Ensemble Learning for U.S. Housing Prices
description: Architected a predictive pricing pipeline for 2.2M+ U.S. properties, synthesizing heterogeneous data sources (crime, tax, demographics) into a gradient-boosting framework to capture complex market drivers.

title: Spotify Popularity Analysis
description: A statistical analysis on 100,000+ Spotify tracks to identify key audio features linked to song popularity.

title: Power Outages Statistical Analysis
description: Developed a Random Forest regressor to forecast regional energy consumption, utilizing permutation tests and NMAR analysis to quantify statistical dependencies between electricity sales and peak demand loss.

title: PSCL Interactive Dashboard
description: The interactive Looker Studio dashboard that provides a user-friendly interface for coaches and players to track their performances and showcase their abilities to college scouts for the PSCL.
